eksath jathika paksha niyojya nayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha prakashayak kirimata uthsaha kala awasthawe di athi wu nosansunthawa hethuwen parlimenthuwe sabhawe katayuthu winadi 15kata thawakalikawa athhituwimata kathanayaka chamal rajapaksha mahatha eeye (8) piyawara gaththe ya.jayasuriya mahatha irida ingrisi puwathpathakata kara thibu prakashaya sambandhayen khanija thel sampath karmantha amathi susil peà·Šramajayantha mahatha kathanayakawarayage awasaraya athiwa wishesha prakashayak sidu kele ya.in anathuruwa me sambandhayen adahas dakwimata karu jayasuriya mahatha uthsaha daru awasthawe di sabhawe nosansunthawak athi wiya.parlimenthuwe pradhana katayuthu arambaimata pera amathi susil peà·Šramajayantha mahatha siya prakashaya kala athara ema prakashaya sambandhayen yamak prakasha kirimata jayasuriya mahatha uthsaha kele ya.
